name: Stay On The Road Racing - Don't get in the wrong lane!
name_original: Stay On The Road Racing - Don't get in the wrong lane!
description:
How many times can you get around the course before you crash into the other cars? In Stay On The Road, you're the yellow car and it's up to you to tap the screen to change lanes and avoid other cars.

Race around the track.
Tap to change lanes.
Avoid the other cars.
Keep racing!

Features one tap gameplay and easy to learn game mechanics for everyone.
